Check input vector compatibility with time series

helpcheck.Rd

Internal helper function that validates input vectors against the time series vector. Performs comprehensive checks for NULL values, numeric type, length compatibility, and missing values. Used by check_grow() to validate all input variables.

Usage

helpcheck(t, vec, name)

Arguments

t

Numeric vector representing the time series

vec

Numeric vector to be validated against the time series

name

Character string specifying the variable name for error messages

Value

Invisible boolean indicating validation success (TRUE) or failure (FALSE)

Details

The function performs the following validation steps:

  • Checks for NULL values in inputs

  • Validates that vec is numeric

  • Ensures vec length matches t length

  • Handles missing values using handle_missing_values()

See also

handle_missing_values(), check_grow()
